title: 1NF1N18Y
author: 1NF1N18Y
created_time: July 18, 2022, 03:40:21 PMLast edit: July 18, 2022, 10:54:54 PM by 1NF1N18Y
content: --Cojin--What is Cojin?Cojin is an experimental yet secure cryptocurrency that is simple to mine and provide easy means of transactions between individuals.Cojin is a decentralized cryptocurrency which uses a hybrid PoW/PoS concept with Scrypt as the algorithm.Cojin is cloned from the Blackcoin source code.Why was Cojin made?Cojin was mainly created to help me(1NF1N18Y) learn about the Blockchain and how cryptocurrency works. After about 6 months I had some super cool ideas to make Cojin a useful coin in the cryptospace.What is our goal?Our goal is to help other crypto projects.How can we help other projects? Here are some examples:1: Make a crypto exchange with low listing fees.2: list their coin on Cojinpool that runs 24/7 and uses the earned fees to airdrop investors.(You can read more about this in the Whitepaper!)* Cojin website/Roadmap/Whitepaper:https://cojin.info/* Github page:https://github.com/cojin-team* Cojin walletsLinux/Windows: https://github.com/cojin-team/cojin/releases* Cojin SpecificationsCoin: CojinTicker: CJNAlgorithm: ScryptSupply: Unlimited supplyPremine: 700k (was used for airdropping due to chain restart)Difficulty change: every blockBlock time: 3 minutesTransaction confirmations: 21Last PoW block: 200,000rpc port: 18326p2p port: 18327No ICO was used.* Community:Discord: https://discord.com/invite/nqDb3vaUEF* Block explorerhttp://explorer.cojin.info/* Miningpools/Cojinpool:https://miningpoolstats.stream/cojinhttps://pools.cojin.info/ Contact information:Discord: 1NF1N18Y#8090Email: 1nf1n19y@gmail.com
